content: 2dc ch1 2dc in corner** repeat twice 1 fpdc 1dc till end slip_stitch to top of ch2 180 st 4 ch1 row 17-23 repeat row 16 each row is an increase of 12 at the end of row 23 you should have 264 sts and 4 ch1 you will notice that your work will start to curl this is right it will lay flat after you complete the next 3 row row 24 slip_stitch to corner ch1 ch1 does not count as a st 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 66 sts 3 single_crochet in the next corner* *repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 66 st slip_stitch to first single_crochet 276 single_crochet row 25 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3sc *1sc in the next 68 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 68sc slip_stitch to first single_crochet 284 single_crochet row 26 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 70 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 70 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 292 single_crochet row 27 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet*1 double_crochet in the next 72 single_crochet 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 double_crochet in the last 72 single_crochet slip_stitch to top of ch2 300 double_crochet row 28 slip_stitch to next double_crochet ch2 1dc ch1 2dc*1fpdc 1dc over the next 74 sts 2dc ch1 2dc in next st**repeat twice i fpdc 1dc over the last 74 sts slip_stitch to top of ch2 312 st 4 ch1 row 29 slip_stitch to ch1 space ch2 1dc ch1 2 double_crochet *miss next post 1 fpdc 1dc to next corner 2dc ch1 2dc in corner **repeat twice 1 fpdc 1dc till end slip_stitch to top of ch2 324st 4 ch1 row 30-36 repeat row 29 each row is an increase of 12 at the end of row 36 you should have 408st 4 ch1 your work will curl but after the next 6 row it will lay flat row 37 slip_stitch to ch1 space ch1 ch1 does not count as a stitch 3sc *1sc in the next 102 sts 3 single_crochet in next st**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 102 sts slip_stitch to first single_crochet 420 single_crochet row 38 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1 single_crochet in the next 104 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 104 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 428sc row 39 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 106 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 106 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 436sc row 40 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 108 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the
